name: @bugsnag/js
description: universal javascript error reporting. automatically detect javascript errors in the browser and node.js, with plugins for react, vue, angular, express, restify and koa.
kwds: universal javascript error reporting. automatically detect javascript errors in the browser and node.js, with plugins for react, vue, angular, express, restify and koa. exception bugsnag error javascript browsers monitoring reporting stability client-side server-side
